name: To The Sea: The Courier
description:
Disorder of the universe ended the peaceful days. The world collapses and falls apart, scattered all over space. Fortunately, human survivors developed dream vision technology, which enables special people who work as “couriers” to transport information and resources through dreams. However, dreams are extremely unstable and may causing massive loss, even the couriers’ lives.

You are playing as one of the couriers. Just wake up from the dormant cabin, you are determined to bring hope to mankind. Will all this be as you wish?

Diverse puzzle challenges


Many carefully crafted environments awaiting your discovery. Finding and making use of those special elements will be your key to success.

Rich Characterization


You are playing as a young girl, who’s passionate, brave and persistent, her unique stories to be unfolded through the adventure.

In search of the secrets


Collect every story fragment, uncover the memories between “you” and “her”.
